mapper.select: select activity.ID as aID,TITLE,IMG,organization.ID as oID,organization.USERNAME,organization.INTRODUCTION as oIN,organization.AVATOR,organization.STATUS,DATE,PLACE,FORM,activity.INTRODUCTION as aIN,CONTENT,GENRES,LIKENUM,CAPACITY,activity.STATUS,activity.SUBSCRIBER_NUM from activity,organization where activity.ID not in (select ACTIVITY_ID from sign_up_form where INDIVIDUAL_USER_ID=#{ID}) and activity.ORGANIZATION_ID=organization.ID;
